name: Temporal MIDI Quantizer
description: Quantizes the timing of MIDI notes based on MIDI clock or input clock pulses. Does not affect pitch. Only processes MIDI Note On/Off messages. Recommend using different input/output MIDI channels.

specifications.name: Channels
specifications.description: The number of MIDI channels to process.

parameters.name: Sync
parameters.description: The timing source to sync to.

parameters.name: Clock input
parameters.description: The input bus to use for clock if Sync is set to Clock.

parameters.name: Output to breakout
parameters.description: Enables MIDI output to the breakout.

parameters.name: Output to Select Bus
parameters.description: Enables MIDI output to the Select Bus.

parameters.name: Output to internal
parameters.description: Enables internal MIDI output (sent to other algorithms).

parameters.name: Input channel
parameters.description: The MIDI channel on which to receive notes.

parameters.name: Output channel
parameters.description: The MIDI channel on which to send notes.

parameters.name: Divisor
parameters.description: The MIDI clock divisor, if Sync is set to MIDI.

parameters.name: Prune short notes
parameters.description: If enabled, notes that are already over by the time the clock pulse comes around are suppressed.
